Hear the full interview below!    http://bit.ly/New-Space Justin Oliveira, CEO of Analytical Space explains how Small Sats, hyperspectral imaging and the use of optical networks are revolutionizing many aspects of the traditional satellite industry. kratoscomms.com Spectral Fingerprints, Laser Communications and the emerging Space Economy | Kratos Communications Justin Oliveira, CEO of Analytical Space explains how Small Sats, hyperspectral imaging and the use of optical networks are revolutionizing many aspects of the traditional satellite industry. Justin Oliveira, CEO of Analytical Space explains how Small Sats, hyperspectral imaging and the use of optical networks are revolutionizing many aspects of the traditional satellite industry. Analytical Space November 8, 2018  ·  Analytical Space will be hosting the first edition of the Downlink speaker series next week at the Engine in Cambridge. Join us for beer, wine and an educational talk on high power-density ultracapacitors for small satellite applications, presented by Wyatt Andree and Susheel Kalabathula from Nanoramic Laboratories.
